name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a vibrant orange box and a distinctive retro console button design. Its arms and legs are made from sturdy foundry materials, giving it a durable and industrial appearance. Unfortunately, its screen is broken, adding a sense of mystery to its capabilities. Retrotron is a member of the WebtrES club, a group of robots dedicated to exploring and preserving the history of web technology.
